summary: Diff shows changes to `frontend/src/components/CoachProfileDetailModal.tsx` adding a bounded modal container (`max-h-[90vh]`, `flex flex-col`), but the provided diff is truncated before any `overflow-y-auto`/scroll container or tab body layout is visible. No evidence of edits under `frontend/src/components/ui/*` appears in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the coach profile detail view so the user can scroll through content that exceeds the viewport height in Posts/Jobs/Comments tabs without clipping.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt only shows `DialogContent` being given `max-h-[90vh]` and a flex column layout, but does not show any actual scroll container (`overflow-y-auto`) or height-bounded body region for the modal content/tabs. Because the file is truncated, there is insufficient evidence that Posts/Jobs/Comments long lists are scrollable and not clipped, or that nested overflow issues were resolved.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/components/CoachProfileDetailModal.tsx` layout/overflow so the scroll container has deterministic height and works with shadcn Dialog without modifying `frontend/src/components/ui` files.
missing_requirements.reason: While `max-h-[90vh]` and `flex flex-col` suggest an approach toward deterministic sizing, the diff does not show the bounded scrollable region (e.g., a dedicated body wrapper with `overflow-y-auto` and appropriate flex/min-height settings). Due to truncation, it cannot be verified that the chosen strategy is fully implemented and avoids `height: 100%` pitfalls/nested overflow traps.
